amendment.description: Amendment sought to allocate an additional $45 million for fossil energy research and development from the energy efficiency and renewable energy account for the purpose of aiding clean coal technology.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Program by $50,000,000, and increase the Fossil Energy Research and Development Program by $45,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 236 (Roll no. 243).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 236 (Roll no. 243).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Griffith.
